meanings.sent1: The sallower drank his juice quickly.
meanings.sent2: The sallower swallowed the pill without any difficulty.
meanings.sent3: The sallower at the eating contest was impressive.
meanings.sent4: She was a sallower of knowledge, always eager to learn.
meanings.sent5: The sallower's ability to gulp down food amazed everyone.

meanings.sent1: Her complexion looked sallower in the winter.
meanings.sent2: The sallower skin tone indicated illness.
meanings.sent3: The sallower paint color made the room feel gloomy.
meanings.sent4: The sallower light of dusk cast long shadows.
meanings.sent5: The sallower leaves signaled the arrival of autumn.
